item.title: Petkin Pet Wipes for Dogs and Cats (Large Size) – Removes Daily Dirt & Odor from Your Pet’s Ears, Eyes, Face, Butt, and Body – Convenient for Home or Travel – Various Pack Quantities Available
item.dc:creator: admin

item.content:encoded:

From the brand

Shop Petkin Grooming Products

Shop Petkin Dental Products

Shop Petkin Sunscreen Products

Shop Petkin Specialty Products

Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 8.5 x 7 x 4.8 inches; 4.08 Pounds
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ November 3, 2020
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Petkin
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B08LMMSQ83
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ USA

Gentle For Your Furry Friend – These refreshing dog wipes are extra gentle and ideal for daily use around your pet’s eyes, ears, face, body and butt. Won’t remove spot flea treatments. Perfect for your puppy, kitten and even pet pig! Lightly scented, vanilla and coconut.
Use Less Wipes – The 7 x 11 inch wipes are larger than standard wipes, making them the smart choice for large pets and helps reduce how many wipes you need to use. Moistened with a gentle cleaning formula, and enriched with a soothing organic oat extract to keep your pet’s coat soft, shiny and smelling great.
Super Convenient, Goodbye Shampoo – Petkins are perfect for quick touch ups between baths. Use as dog paw wipes after a muddy walk, or when it’s too cold for a bath outside. A great solution for older pets that are difficult to bathe.
Easy To Use – Open the lid and remove seal. Pull a wet dog wipe out. Close lid tightly. Gently wipe entire pet until clean. No water or rinsing is required. Use daily or as needed.





Read more



Original Wipes Germ Wipes Oatmeal Wipes Paw Wipes Plaque Wipes Plaque Gel
Why Use? Wipes that help freshen up your pet every day. Easily remove daily dirt and odor with a quick wipe down Heavy duty pet wipes that remove daily dirt and odor, like washing hands. Cleans your pet without shampoo Gentle pet wipes enriched with oatmeal. Easily remove daily dirt, alongside soothing dry, itchy skin The quick and convenient way to remove dirt, sand and mud from your pet’s paws after outdoor fun Dental wipes that remove daily residue to keep your pet’s teeth and gums clean and healthy Easy to use dental gel that cleans teeth, gums, plaque and tartar while freshening your pet’s breath
For Dogs & Cats ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓
No Parabens or Sulfates ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓
Veterinarian Tested ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

(as of Nov 30,2022 09:52:15 UTC – Details)

MATTER OF MINUTES: Breathe freely and sleep better as the air purifier uses 360° VortexAir Technology 3.0 and 3-stage filtration to ensure top-notch air purification
QUIET OPERATION: Sleep soundly without loud rattling coming from your air purifier. This little air purifier keeps noise levels as low as 25dB while keeping your space fresh
AROMATHERAPY: Struggling with pet odors or musty smells, Add a few drops of fragrant essential oils to the aroma pad to keep your space smelling great
SAVE SPACE: Tired of dragging a bulky purifier back and forth, Light, travel-friendly, and compact, the Levoit Core Mini Air Purifier (6.5 × 6.5 × 10.4 in) easily fits in any bedroom, office, or living room, creating less clutter and more fresh air

Learn More
Learn More
Learn More
Learn More


Feeling down with poor air quality?

Previous page

  1. Does your air feel stuffy?

    Small rooms can have poor air circulation, making them feel stuffy—especially when outdoor pollution is bad.

  2. Struggling to sleep?

    It’s hard to sleep soundly when airborne pollutants, such as dust and pollen, cause headaches, congestion, and coughing.

  3. Finding it hard to concentrate?

    Smoky smells, pollen from desk flowers, and airborne dust can make it difficult to focus at work.

  4. Noticing pet dander and smell?

    We love our pets, but these cute furry friends can come with pet dander and odors that lower our air quality.

Next page

Want to combat these issues but running into problems like these…

Poor Performance

Some air purifiers can run all night, but still do little to improve our air quality.

Loud & Noisy

Many conventional air purifiers operate with high noise levels, making it hard to fall asleep.

Too Big & Bulky

Lots of air purifiers are so big, it’s hard to find space for them in small rooms.

No Fragrance

Many air purifiers don’t offer the ability to add essential oils.

Finally, Meet the Levoit Core Mini Air Purifier

Previous page
Next page

The results? It has seriously made a world of difference!

No space is too small for this compact air purifier

Put it on your nightstand

Noticed a difference in sleep quality

Use it at the office

Put all your energy into your work

Place it on your dresser

Reduced the amount of dust on your dresser

Refresh your living room

It circulates the air well and makes it feel fresh.

“Mini” but Great

  1. We can’t always do great things, but we can do ‘mini’ things with great love.

    Whether you’re putting together your nursery, upgrading your workspace, or adding aromatherapy to your room—discover the “Great” difference one “Mini” air purifier can make.

  2. Every Mini Detail

    Every aspect of the Levoit Core Mini Air Purifier is designed with thoughtful innovation, so you can create a healthy space that’s just right for you.

4.5
Price: $49.99 - $41.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:15:19 UTC – Details)

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $19.99 - $12.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:10:30 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Why choose our UV light flashlight instead of others?

Focus on R&D and Sales of Innovative UV Flashlights Series for 10 years! Come To Join Our Vansky Brand UV Flashlight Family With Over 10 Million Satisfied Customers!

What makes our products unique?

Our UV Flashlights are Made of Ultra-Tough High-precision Aluminum Throughout, and HD Brightness Led Lamp Beads are Like the Eyes of An Owl Looking for “PREY” at Night.

What kind of customer shopping experience can you get ?

With Experienced and Professional Team, Vansky Continuously Pursues Innovation and Sound Growth, and are Striving to Provide Customer An Extraordinary and Comfortable Shopping Experience.

Vansky UV Light Flashlight

Find invisible stains: UV flashlight helps detect food stains and pet urine stains on rugs, carpets, and clothes that are otherwise invisible to the naked Eye. Not work well on cat urine
Versatile use: authenticate currency and official documents like drivers licenses or identify unwanted whitening agent in cosmetics
Perfect for outside use such as finding scorpions and minerals! Shoul used with 3xAA Standard Alkaline Battery (Battery Not Included)
Durable, high-quality lads: the 51 tenacious UV light LEDs have a lifespan of 15 years
Ultra-compact design: The pocket-size UV flashlight can be carried along to detect stains in your car or illuminate minerals, body art

  • Voltage:4.5V
  • Material:Aluminum Alloy
  • Runtime:4-6 Hours on Full Battery
  • Battery:3xAA Standard Alkaline Battery (Not Included)

Emits 390 to 395 nanometer wavelength

The strong Aluminum alloy body makes this product durable and long lasting, and the large head with 51 LED makes this flashlight brighter than others products.

  • Can only spot dried urine stain;
  • Does not work on reflective surface or carpet with fluoresce;
  • The ultraviolet led black light works best in dark environment, the darker it is, the better it works;
  • For few dark color carpets, the reflected stain color will be very close to the color of the carpet, making it harder to see;
  • Remove all batteries if you did not intend to use it for a long time.

Read more

Scorpions Finder

If you live in or are traveling to a scorpion prone area, UV lights are an easy way to detect these hazardous pests, day or night.

Pets Urine Detector

Revealing dry dog and rodent stains and unfavourable spots that couldn’t see with the naked eye.

Glow Party World

Looking to light up your party, or next halloween celebration, then this is the way to go.

item.content:encoded:
Technical Details

Brand ‎Refresh Your Car
Model ‎09136

Product Dimensions ‎7.48 x 2.99 x 0.98 inches
Country of Origin ‎China

Customer Reviews

3.7 out of 5 stars

Best Sellers Rank #2,908 in Automotive (See Top 100 in Automotive)
#71 in Automotive Air Fresheners
Date First Available September 1, 2010

Price: $8.25 - $2.69
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:26:48 UTC – Details)


Once attached to your vent, Refresh Your Car Mini Diffusers allow you to adjust the fragrance level of your car. The smaller size allows you to put them in more areas of your car, without blocking the flow of air. The Hawaiian Sunrise scent is a vibrant yet subtle tropical bouquet. The primary notes of island coconut and ripe banana combine with a center of exotic tropical fruits finished with a subtle vanilla base.
Designed to provide a powerful scent the moment the package is opened
The smaller size allows you to put them in more areas of your car
Will not block airflow from vents
Hawaiian Sunrise scent

Clips to Any Vent

Use the power of your vehicle’s climate-control system to eliminate odors* with easy-to-use vent sticks, mini diffusers or oil wicks. The fragrance automatically fills your cabin when the climate-control system is turned on. *Reduces the perception of odors

Dispense Freshness

Pump up the fragrance with easy-to-use vent pump sprays. These car air fresheners attach to any vent. Simply squeeze the top and bottom of the pump spray to dispense long-lasting odor elimination* and scent control. *Reduces the perception of odors

Stash It Anywhere

Breathe in the freshness! These charcoal odor absorbers make time in the car more enjoyable. Best of all, they’re easy to use. Place them anywhere you want to eliminate odors* in your car. *Reduces the perception of odors

Read more

Works on Pet Odors

Furry friends can cause a stink. Breathe fresh in your car, truck or van when you use Refresh Your Car! products. The only thing you’ll smell is the thrill of the open road.

Helps Reduce Sweaty-smelling Car Interior

Refresh Your Car! charcoal bags, vent sticks, mini diffusers, mini oil wicks and vent pump sprays also go to work on odors from sweaty shoes to stinky workout clothes.

Eliminates Residual Food Aromas

Last night’s takeout haunting your ride? Refresh Your Car! car deodorizers also devour food odors. The odor elimination technology reduces the perception of odors from foods like pizza or fajitas.

Read more

Read more

Read more

3.5
Price: $8.25 - $2.69
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:26:48 UTC – Details)
